predicate.note: Frames file for 'document' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Good , who [*T*-1] documents these things as best he can [*?*] , provides an official explanation in the form of a memorandum from Chief of Staff George C. Marshall to President Roosevelt : `` 1,430 pounds of ammunition , '' he wrote his commander in chief [0] [*T*-2] , were expended [*-3] on `` unidentified aircraft , '' flying at speeds as slow as 200 mph and elevations between 9,000 and 18,000 feet .

example.name: passive
example.text: All this was recognized and documented [*-1] in the succeeding years by economists , some of whom [*T*-2] worked in the Reagan administration [*-3] to lift this burden from the American people , states and local governments .
example.arg: economists , some of whom [*T*-2] worked in the Reagan administration [*-3] to lift this burden from the American people , states and local governments
